WorkItem.Description: Would it be possible to include a simple WoW-Addon that exports bag and bank contents to an XML file for import into Rawr? This would make keeping the items available ingame and the Rawr lists in sync much easier imho. Are there any addons that already can do item list exports?
WorkItem.Summary: [Feature Request.LoadCharacter] Semi-Automatic import of available items from Character Profiler

Comments.Message: Rawr will import from Character Profiler.  You will need to check that all gemmings you wish to include are included; there was a design decision made about whether to flag all items as available, or only the specific gemmings that you have.  I can't remember which it did.
I seem to have missed that, many thanks for clearing that up!

Ok, after trying this for some time now I agree that the function is already in place. It doesn't seem to correctly get the talent specs etc. though. So I propose adding an option "Import items from CharacterProfiler" which only updates which items are available, but leaves everything else untouched, meaning I could update from armory, then update items from CharacterProfiler to get a complete representation of my current ingame status.

Feature already available



** Closed by Jothay 11/25/2009 10:05 AM
Can't you already do this with Tools->Reload Current Character from Character Profiler?
at least for me this will reset talent trees etc. i can check again though
